message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal. Consider this one!
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit. I'll take 48% and you can have 52%. This is my final offer. What do you say?
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share. Don't expect any more generosity from me!
